claims.claim: General Mills achieved over $20 million in savings from AI models assessing daily shipments
claims.quote: AI models also assess more than 5,000 daily shipments from plants to warehouses, leading to more than $20 million in savings since its 2024 fiscal year.

claims.claim: General Mills predicts over $50 million in waste reduction from real-time manufacturing performance data
claims.quote: General Mills predicts real-time performance data in manufacturing will produce more than $50 million in waste reduction this year.

claims.claim: General Mills reduced transportation costs and boosted customer service levels using AI in logistics planning
claims.quote: The food industry giant reduced transportation costs and boosted customer service levels by using AI in its logistics planning, CFO Kofi Bruce said.

claims.claim: General Mills doubled its digital, data and technology investments since 2019
claims.quote: General Mills' digital, data and technology investments have doubled since 2019, CEO Jeff Harmening.

claims.claim: General Mills achieved over $20 million in savings from AI models assessing daily shipments
claims.quote: AI models also assess more than 5,000 daily shipments from plants to warehouses, leading to more than $20 million in savings since its 2024 fiscal year.

claims.claim: General Mills predicts over $50 million in waste reduction from real-time manufacturing performance data
claims.quote: General Mills predicts real-time performance data in manufacturing will produce more than $50 million in waste reduction this year.

claims.claim: General Mills reduced transportation costs and boosted customer service levels using AI in logistics planning
claims.quote: The food industry giant reduced transportation costs and boosted customer service levels by using AI in its logistics planning, CFO Kofi Bruce said.

claims.claim: A leading broadcast network achieved 300% increase in engagement using Palantir technology
claims.quote: Another slide claims that a 'leading broadcast network' with its own OTT platform used Palantir to organize its audiences by group and track customer journeys, leading to a '300% increase in engagement of a target group in one campaign.'

claims.claim: Palantir's commercial business generated over $1 billion in revenue in 2023 with 20% year-over-year growth
claims.quote: Palantir's commercial business generated more than $1 billion in revenue in 2023 and grew 20% year over year.
